Aroma is fudge, toffee, maple syrup, some liquorice and quite strong on vanilla too. Flavour is liquorice, vanilla, toffee, some ripe fruits, raisins and mild syrup notes.
Tap @ Copenhagen Beer Celebration, 2016. As German Chocolate Cupcake Maple. Black body with a small light brown head. Roasted malt, milk chocolate, maple syrup, vanilla.

Draught. Pitch black coloured. Dense brown head. Aroma. Roast, brown sugar, syrup, chcolate, some vanilla and nuts. Flavour. Roast, sweetness, chocolate, light coffee, nuts, caramel, vague liqourice, vanilla. Medium to full bodied. Ends roasted and sweet.

Draught @ CBC 2016 [ Red Session ]. - Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, Oksnehallen Vesterbro, Halmtorvet 11, 1700 Copenhagen, Denmark. [ As Angry Chair German Chocolate Cupcake Stout - Maple ].ABV: 7.5%. Clear dark black brown color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, beige head. Aroma is light heavy malty, roasted, chocolate, maple, coffee, cake. Flavor is moderate to heavy sweet with a long duration, chocolate, cake, maple, sweet malt. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft. [20160514]
Tap at CBC 16, red session. Malty. Aroma of roasted malt, chocolate, caramel, nuts. Starts sweet but finish light bitter. Balanced. A good one
From tap at CBC 2016. Black with a beige head. Aroma and flavour of chocolate, maple, coffee, dried fruit, vanilla and caramel.
CBC 2016 Red session. Black body with a small light brown head. Aroma of chocolate, maple and dark fruits. Taste of cocoa, vanilla, coffee. Mild floral notes. Quite sweet. Nice stuff.
On tap @ CBC-16. Very dark brown with a tiny brown head. Fruity and vanilla tones. Malt, fruit,coffee, chocolate and bitterness. Full body with a long malty finish.

CBC as "German Chocolate Cupcake Stout - Maple". Black with small beige head. Aroma is roasted malts, chocolate, coffee and little maple. Flavour is roasted malts, chocolate, coffee, little maple, little bitter, sweet and a little vanilla.

Draught @ CBC 2016, Red session, København
Pours black with a tan head. Aroma has notes of roasted malt, chocolate, vanilla, brown sugar and coffee. Taste is medium to heavy sweet and medium bitter with a long chocolate, vanilla, brown sugar and coffee finish. Body is full, texture is oily, carbonation is soft.

[email protected]/* <![CDATA[ */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* ]]> */ Beer Celebration 2016, Copenhagen -dark brown verging black pour with tan head. Aroma and taste is sweet malty with some big chocolate prominence, caramel, some maple sweetness, nice vanilla nuances into the close.

From tap at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016 - Red session. Black color with beige brown head. Roasted malty aroma, chocolate, cocoa, caramel, licorice, maple. Sweet and bitter like aroma. Full silky oily to creamy body with soft carbonation.

Draught at Mikkeller Bar.
Pitch black colored with a huge beige head.
Sweet and roasted aroma of caramel with notes of maple syrup and vanilla.
Sweet and roasted flavor of caramel and vanilla with notes of chocolate.
Sweet and roasted finish.

Draught @ CBC 2016. Pours black with a brown head, lacings. Aroma of sweet malt, rich chocolate, brownies, vanilla, marple sirup, little nuts. Flavor is sweet, malty, caramel, rich chocolate, cake, vanilla, marple sirup. Full body, oily mouthfeel, soft carbonation, sweet finish with some warming alcohol. 140516
[5/14/16] Draught sample at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Red session. Black. Aroma of roast, chocolate, a bit vegetal. Sweet flavor with chocolate, vanilla, maple. Quite full-bodied.
CBC. Black with a brown head. Aroma is sweet, roasted malt, chocolate and maple syrup. Flavor is very sweet and moderate bitter. Dry and moderate bitter finish. 140516
CBC16, red session, tap. Black with a tan head. Aroma medium malty (caramel, cocoa, maple syrup). Flavor medium sweet, light bitter. Medium body. Really nice. Smooth and round from the maple.
Sample at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Black with a thin brown head. Notes of warming red fruits, Nutella, maple. Sweet, chewy and tasty. Good mix of elements at play here.

On tap at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Black with a beige head. Aroma is maple, chocolate cake, vanilla, prune. Full bodied, syrupy mouthfeel, sweet on the palate. Taste is chocolate cake, maple syrup, vanilla, honey, dates.
On tap at CBC 2016 - day 2. Pitch black, full bodied. Cupcake aroma, with notes of maple syrup, cocoa, chocolate. A bit too sweet, but otherwise great.

@Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, REDblack. Mudcakey nose. Good chocolate, some peacan maple syrup on nose. Full bodied, smooth soft filling. Chocolate dry coffee. Real nice.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
Sample at CBC 2016. Sweet smell with maple syrup. Similar taste, very sweet with dark malts. The maple syrup was very noticeable. For the sugar tooth.

Sample at CBC 2016. 

Black with a tan head. Sweet with chocolate, caramel, light coffee and some vanilla. The body was medium and the finish sweet.
Tap @CBC16. Black with thick brown head. Aroma has vanilla, chcolate and maple syrup. Similar flavour with light coffee. Really rice.

Red session, Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016.Opaque black beer with a nice beige/brownish head. Chocolate and maple aroma, licorice, caramel, cocoa powder notes. Maple and chocolate flacor, coffee notes, licorice some warming alcohol Quite nice.
CBC2016. Schwarze Farbe, geringe beige Schaumkrone. Geruch süß röstmalzig, Vanille, Kaffee, viel Schokolade. Geschmack sehr süß, Vanille, Kaffee, Schokolade, Pudding.

14.05.2016, tap @ CBC:
Nice light brown creamy mediumlasting head. Aroma is slightly sour-ish sweet, dark sugar, dark malts, caramel, nuts, chocolate, maple syrup, hints of coffee. Taste is sweet, dark sugar, dark malts, maple syrup, burnt caramel, nuts, chocolate, hay, minerals, cinnamon. Medium bitterness, sweet mouthfeel. Fair enough.

Tap @ CBC -16. black with a small tan head. sweet aroma with loads of chocolate and malts. flavor is sweet caramel, malts and moderate roasty. nice but very sweet. long sweet chocolate finish. medium full body and soft co2 levels.
From tap at CBC 2016. It pours jet black with a creamy beige head. The aroma is sweet roasted and chocolate with light coconut notes. Sweet roasted flavor with syrupy and cocoa notes.
Tap cbc. Pours black with brown head. Aroma of choko, roast, licorice, light brown sugar, molasses. Taste is heavy sweet, loads of molasses, light coffee and roast.
Pours black with low tan head. Aroma of chocolate, coffee, light maple. Taste is sweet, rich coconut and maple, light bitter finish. Rich and creamy body with soft carbonation.

Draught @ CBC 2016, Copenhagen. Pours dark brown with a smooth head. Aroma of maple syrup, toffee, oak, mudcake, coffee and vanilla. Taste is sweet, sticky and syrupy with some coffee, mudcake, chocolate, and loads of maple syrup. Finish is sticky, sweet and syrupy. A bit too sweet.
Tap@ CBC 2016. Pours near black with a thick brown head. Maple syrup dominates, chocolate mousse, cocoa. Flavor has sweetness, chocolate mousse, honey, mocha. Huge stuff.

Tap at CBC2016, Copenhagen. Colour is dark brown with small white head. Aromas and flavors: Chocolate, some coffee, sweetness, syrup and roasted malts. German cupcake is great beer but this version is too sweet for me.
Keg at cbc16... Dark black.. Thin tan lacing... Soft chocolate r.. Big maple nose.. Dark chocolate.. Rich chocolate roast.. Soft sweet maple

Draft. A brown beer with a brown head. The aroma has notes of maple syrup, roasted malt, and chcolate. The flavr is sweet with notes of maple syrup, roasted malt, and chocolate, leading to a bitter finish.

From tap. Pours hazy brown with a small tan head. Aroma is maplesyrup. Dark malty and toffee. Dense syrupy. Smooth roasted and lingering dark malty. Caramelish and toffee. Lingering dark malty finish.

Draft pour on tap at Angry Chairs Tampa Bay Beer Week Event (Tampa, FL). Pours a nice rich deep blackish hue, near opaque with darker brown edges and glow, frothy dark brown head atop. Aromas show some potent punchy sweet maple, integrating into the fudgey and dark chocolate base. Flavors are silky and sweet, managing roast and toast through a sweeter appeal overall. Caramel, nougat, sweet maple and cocoa nibs dance liberally. Flavorful, rich, desserty. Delicious stuff that really flows just lovely.
